raw_body: Loving wife of the late Thiagalingam Parathalingam, beloved daughter of the late R. Doresamy and Nagamma Doresamy, darling mother of Sankarshana, Dakshana, Santali, Hiram, Aumanthi, Jaish and the late Ajita, mother-in-law of Anglica, Victor, Paru, Shankar and Adrian, darling grandmother of Anish, Amrisha, Nishkan, Aksha, Arati, Ganeshi, Sachin, Vikram, Tirupati, Anjum, Jaikishen and Aishi, darling great grandmother of Maithri, Maheshi and Nelum.
